ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectRegulations Amending the Determination of Country of Origin for the Purpose of Marking Goods (Non-NAFTA Countries) Regulations and the Determination of Country of Origin for the Purposes of Marking Goods (NAFTA Countries) Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the DETERMINATION OF COUNTRY OF ORIGIN FOR THE PURPOSE OF MARKING GOODS (NON-NAFTA COUNTRIES) REGULATIONS AND THE DETERMINATION OF COUNTRY OF ORIGIN FOR THE PURPOSES OF MARKING GOODS (NAFTA COUNTRIES) REGULATIONS in order to amend Canadaâ€™s country of origin marking rules to align with United States requirements for certain steel and aluminum products, and to address the transhipment and diversion of unfairly cheap foreign steel and aluminum into the North American market.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0116 Publication Date: 2018-06-13
